title: Smart Data Models - Machine Learning Model
description: Data model for compilation of the elements of a machine learning model.

algorithm.description: Property. The algorithm used by the underlying Machine Learning model (e.g. linear regression, k-means, SVM, MLP,...)

mlFramework.description: Property. The Machine Learning framework that has been used to prepare the model (e.g., scikit-learn, H2O, Spark MLib, etc)

acceptableDataSources.description: Property. Valid type of input data sources for running the Machine Learning Model

outputDataTypes.description: Property. Type of output data produced by the Machine Learning Model

dockerImage.description: Property. Docker image containing the Machine Learning model

inputAttributes.description: Property. Comma-separated list of attributes names (that should have a given type by definition).

outputAttributes.description: Property. Comma-separated list of attributes names used to publish the results.
